casename: Chee Soon Juan v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Appellant in person; Bala Reddy (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent; Hui Choon Kuen (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Constitutional Law/Fundamental liberties/Freedom of speech/Whether violated by laws regulating licencing of public entertainment/Constitution of the Republic of Singapore art 14(2((a)

Public Entertainment/Places of entertainment/Right to express opinion/Attempt to hold rally on grounds of Istana without licence/Whether "public entertainment"/Activities considered "public entertainment"/Public Entertainments and Meetings Act (Cap 257, 2001 Rev Ed) ss 2, 19(1)(a)
Words and Phrases/"Public entertainment"/Public Entertainments and Meetings Act (Cap 257, 2001 Rev Ed) s 2
